attributes.action: Change the minimum voting age from 18 to 16.
attributes.additional_details: We think that there is not much difference in an 18 and 16 year old: same social media access, same responsibilities and both make decisions for their future. As a 16 year old, you should be able to have a say in the future of your country as it will impact the younger generation far more than the older generation.
attributes.background: Young people's opinions should be heard and talked about. Lowing the voting age can support this and could help eliminate age discrimination.
